title: Election: God’s Sovereign Choice
excerpt: A reflection on God’s sovereign choice in salvation, grounded in His eternal purpose and grace.

title: Regeneration: The New Birth
excerpt: Exploring how the Holy Spirit gives new life to those who were spiritually dead, making them alive in Christ.

title: Effectual Calling: The Voice That Summons
excerpt: The divine call that brings the sinner irresistibly to Christ, ensuring that God’s saving purpose is fulfilled.

title: Conversion: Turning to God in Faith and Repentance
excerpt: A study of the Spirit-empowered turning of the soul from sin to the Savior—showing that even faith and repentance are gifts of divine grace.
